attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: All fixed rate mortgages to be suspended (free of fees) over the current recession. This would direct the cash into the local economy and keep families in their own homes and support local businesses. This could be reviewed in the future. I am not on a fixed rate but can see the damage they are doing to families that have over stretched with their mortgage with encouragement from the banks and building socities.

reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
